overview:
IORecursiveLockUnlock FunctionIORecursiveLockUnlockDriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOSvoid IORecursiveLockUnlock(struct IORecursiveLock * lock); Parameters lockPointer to the allocated lock.

Unlock a recursive lock.

Undo one call to IORecursiveLockLock, if the lock is now unlocked wake any blocked waiters. Results are undefined if the caller does not balance calls to IORecursiveLockLock with IORecursiveLockUnlock.

# IORecursiveLockUnlock | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IORecursiveLockUnlock ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockunlock)

-  IORecursiveLockUnlock 

Function# IORecursiveLockUnlock

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IORecursiveLockUnlock(struct IORecursiveLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockunlock#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iorecursivelockunlock#discussion)

Unlock a recursive lock.

Undo one call to IORecursiveLockLock, if the lock is now unlocked wake any blocked waiters. Results are undefined if the caller does not balance calls to IORecursiveLockLock with IORecursiveLockUnlock.
